short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Search Bar extension will focus the search bar element on a website after pressing the keyboard shortcut CTRL + SPACE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention is used to increase productivity of the users by allowing them focus the cursor to the search bar on supported websites like youtube, facebook etc.
